name: Andrey Luiz
title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
summary: Full stack engineer with 12+ years of experience, specializing in JavaScript frameworks, TypeScript, Next.js, Python, and AWS. Worked on apps for Smart TVs and PS4, from development with React, to approval, and launch. Enhanced user experience and drove business growth at reputable Swiss firms like SonarSource and Scout24. Crafted production ready apps with React Native and launched on Google Play and Apple Store, expanding company's reach in different countries.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Delivered three key features for SonarCloud's project section in React, integrating with RESTful APIs to enhance data retrieval and improve Clean Code Taxonomy integration and user education on coding best practices.
Pioneered CaYC team's adoption of 8 critical features, streamlining workflow efficiency and cross-team collaboration.
Migrated SonarCloud's issues screen to MIUI using React, receiving positive feedback from senior leadership for improving the daily workflow of developers.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Enhanced Equip app's map search and rental processes, reducing prototype development time by 3 months.
Optimized Bluetooth capabilities of the hybrid app for connection with rental stations, increasing reliability from 20% to 100%.
Launched the Equip app on Play Store and Apple Store, expanding the company's reach in three countries.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Enhanced and refactored Anibis Messenger using React and TypeScript, getting positive reactions from management.
Migrated messaging services from Twilio to Sendbird, ensuring full adoption by 100% of users in the first month.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Conducted new features for the SkyQ application (British Sky Broadcasting), utilizing Redux for state management and local storage for optimized performance, improving user experience and availability in all countries where the product was present.
Authored and deployed key features for SkyQ on PlayStation 4, expanding product reach via successful store releases.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Spearheaded DataRisk's initial frontend application by leveraging React and Redux, enabling the first three first clients to test the new innovative machine learning product.
Led frontend development, collaborating with designers to launch the company's first beta product, securing initial customers.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
achievements: Introduced key features in JavaScript and jQuery for the Landing Pages team, enhancing product quality and customer experience.
Migrated the landing pages editor to a WYSIWYG interface, improving usability and design flexibility, and getting positive feedback from clients in the first weeks of release.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
achievements: Developed features for a JIRA testing management plugin using Angular.js, helping Kanoah secure the first international customers.
Led frontend development for testing suites, improving Kanoah's market competitiveness.
Handle a family transition and relocate to another canton to explore new opportunities.
Deepen expertise in Rust, Python, and .NET to help guide future career decisions.
Build personal full-stack projects including andreyluiz.com, cv.andreyluiz.com, and others, to keep sharp skills.
Study how AI is shaping the future of software development, applied to senior engineers.
Begin job search on January 2025 looking for long-term impactful opportunities.

education.degree: Diploma in Software Engineering and Development
